title: Welcome!
description: You don't need to be an environmentalist to enjoy and maintain a healthy living environment.

title: Our Objective
description: by visualising pollution in your neighborhoods, we wish to make you commited to the pursuit of a healthier community lifestyle.

title: That's why
description: Let's be competitive! While signing up to GreeNeighborhood, you get to make an impact on your neighborhood's ranking amongst others.

title: How?
description: By choosing to take certain actions everyday, your neighborhood's score increases. We hope to make a direct corelation between a neighborhood's score and it's pollution factors.
